channel.title: CVE Feed for ILLID -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ILLID -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47622|2024-10-05T14:36:20.406Z -- illid -- advanced%20woo%20labels
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ILLID Advanced Woo Labels allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Advanced Woo Labels: from n/a through 2.01.

item.title: CVE-2024-33930|2024-08-02T02:42:59.832Z -- illid -- share%20this%20image
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in ILLID Share This Image.This issue affects Share This Image: from n/a through 1.97.

item.title: CVE-2024-35675|2024-06-10T13:39:00.337Z -- illid -- advanced%20woo%20labels
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ILLID Advanced Woo Labels allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Advanced Woo Labels: from n/a through 1.93.

item.title: CVE-2024-33930|2024-06-04T17:44:58.932Z -- illid -- share%20this%20image
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in ILLID Share This Image.This issue affects Share This Image: from n/a through 1.97.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ILLID Advanced Woo Labels allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Advanced Woo Labels: from n/a through 1.93.
